item.title: Coda Pay Receives $2 Million for Asian Expansion - Bitcoin News
item.description:
Coda Pay Receives $2 Million for Asian Expansion - Bitcoin News

Singapore-based startup Also read: Amazon-Rival Rakuten Forms Blockchain Lab Coda Pay is bringing Bitcoin and alternative payment processing to South East Asian markets with its recent capital injection. The company has just announced it has raised $2 million USD to push its efforts forward.

item.title: If You Want To Buy Bitcoin, Avoid Greyscale Bitcoin Investment Trust For Now
item.description:
If You Want To Buy Bitcoin, Avoid Greyscale Bitcoin Investment Trust For Now

There are only a limited number of ways to get exposure to Bitcoin on the public markets right now. Until the Winklevoss twins are able to launch their COIN exchange traded fund, options are limited for investors who want access to Bitcoin.

item.title: GDAX Users Can Now Trade Litecoin Against USD and Bitcoin
item.description:
GDAX Users Can Now Trade Litecoin Against USD and Bitcoin

Although it had been a rumour for quite some time now, the Litecoin community will rejoice at the news GDAX has added LTC trading. This news is great for the community, although it does not give Litecoin any more usability than it had before. Moreover, the volumes on GDX are small to nonexistent right now.

item.title: Chinese Government Explores Digital Currency Technology with the Blockchain Working Group - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Chinese Government Explores Digital Currency Technology with the Blockchain Working Group - NEWSBTC

Chinese Government has announced the creation of a Blockchain Working Group to develop and implement distributed ledger technology in the country. Read more... The Chinese government, in an attempt to keep up with the rapidly changing tech scenario, has announced the creation of a Blockchain Working Group.

item.title: [bitcoin-core-dev] Bitcoin Core 0.13.0 released
item.description:

item.title: EB145 - Stephen King & Russell McLernon: Distrupting Real Estate With RexMLS - A Decentralized MLS
item.description:
EB145 - Stephen King & Russell McLernon: Distrupting Real Estate With RexMLS - A Decentralized MLS

One of the sectors which is ripe for disruption is the real estate industry. In the US for instance, a handful of historic and very powerful players operate what is known as MLS, or Multiple Listing Services, and hold unofficial monopolies on residential and commercial real estate listings.

item.title: What is the best way to buy large block of bitcoin (note: currently work and live in Gulf)?
item.description:
What is the best way to buy large block of bitcoin (note: currently work and live in Gulf)?

As captivating as I can be, when a child doesn't have a place to live, regular sleep, food, warm clothing, and LOVE; processing my words is impossible. I can only control so much in a student's life. I can make sure they eat breakfast and lunch, organize food/clothing drives, hug them and build them up, give their parents access to community...

item.title: Why Did Only Five People Bid on the Feds' Bitcoin Stash?
item.description:
Why Did Only Five People Bid on the Feds' Bitcoin Stash?

Someone has purchased $1.6 million worth of Bitcoin from the U.S. Marshals Service. That's not a bad haul, and whoever purchased the bitcoins gets to hold on to some of the cryptocurrency seized from the illicit Silk Road marketplace. So why did only five people bother to place bids for the block of 2,700 bitcoins?

item.title: Bitfury Research Seeks to Shine Light on Bitcoin Mixing Methods - CoinDesk
item.description:
Bitfury Research Seeks to Shine Light on Bitcoin Mixing Methods - CoinDesk

A new Bitfury white paper aims to advance the study of how bitcoins sent using certain privacy-enhancing techniques could be traced back to participants. Released today, "Shared Send Untangling in Bitcoin" explores how bitcoins in this type of transaction can be "untangled", or sorted into their "original" value flows.

item.title: What the Experts Tweeted about the Ethereum Hard Fork, Ethereum Classic
item.description:
What the Experts Tweeted about the Ethereum Hard Fork, Ethereum Classic

All reports from Ethereum posits the hard fork a success. There has been criticism, as many people fear that a blockchain via democratic measures is no blockchain at all. Hacking Distributed penned an article concerning itself over a lack of best principles in some of the hard fork code.
